Class DbUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • DbUtilities

  • public class DbUtilities
extends Object
    Provides methods for: 1. Retrieving data sets from MySQL databases. 2. For executing UPDATE, INSERT, DELETE queries 3. For building tables to populate data grids (JTable)
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Dmitriy Babichenko

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DbUtilities()
      Default constructor creates a connection to database at the time of instantiation.
      DbUtilities(String hostName, String dbName, String dbUserName, String dbPassword)
      Alternate constructor - use it to connect to any MySQL database

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean executeQuery(String sql)
      Executes INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE queries
      DefaultTableModel getDataTable(String sql)
      Creates a model for JTable using default database table column names as table headers
      DefaultTableModel getDataTable(String sqlQuery, String[] customColumnNames)
      Creates a model for JTable using custom column names
      ResultSet getResultSet(String sql)
      Get SQL result set (data set) based on an SQL query

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DbUtilities

        public DbUtilities()
        Default constructor creates a connection to database at the time of instantiation.

      • DbUtilities

        public DbUtilities(String hostName,
                   String dbName,
                   String dbUserName,
                   String dbPassword)
        Alternate constructor - use it to connect to any MySQL database
        Parameters:
        hostName - - server address/name of MySQL database
        dbName - - name of the database to connect to
        dbUserName - - user name for MySQL database
        dbPassword - - password that matches dbUserName for MySQL database

    • Method Detail

      • getResultSet

        public ResultSet getResultSet(String sql)
                       throws SQLException
        Get SQL result set (data set) based on an SQL query
        Parameters:
        sql - - SQL SELECT query
        Returns:
        - ResultSet - java.sql.ResultSet object, contains results from SQL query argument
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • executeQuery

        public boolean executeQuery(String sql)
        Executes INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE queries
        Parameters:
        sql - - SQL statement - a well-formed INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE query
        Returns:
        true if execution succeeded, false if failed

      • getDataTable

        public DefaultTableModel getDataTable(String sql)
                               throws SQLException
        Creates a model for JTable using default database table column names as table headers
        Parameters:
        sql - - SQL SELECT query
        Returns:
        a model for JTable
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • getDataTable

        public DefaultTableModel getDataTable(String sqlQuery,
                                      String[] customColumnNames)
                               throws SQLException
        Creates a model for JTable using custom column names
        Parameters:
        sqlQuery - - SQL SELECT query
        customColumnNames - - an array containing custom column names for table headers
        Returns:
        a model for JTable
        Throws:
        SQLException
